laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Stool culture for Salmonella and Shigella

laboratory_examinations.findings: Decreased lung volumes, mild bilateral pleural effusions, subtle right upper lobe opacity suggestive of early pneumonia, moderate cardiomegaly, mild retrocardiac atelectasis.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Lung volumes have further decreased compared to the previous radiograph.
